Uses of Interface
scenegraph.ChannelInterface

  • Packages that use ChannelInterface 
    Package Description
    animation
    Provides controllers that can animate a scene by changing characteristics of the scene objects through a channelized interface.
    examples.controller  
    particles  
    scenegraph
    Provides classes for all scene graph components: cameras, lights, geometries, materials, colors with all their attributes.

    • Uses of ChannelInterface in animation

      Classes in animation that implement ChannelInterface 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      class  AbstController
      Base class for animation controllers.
      class  CameraController
      Controller for interactive camera positioning and orientation.
      class  FollowerCameraController
      The camera shall move along a certain path in the 3D scene.
      class  FunctionR1R1Controller
      Manipulates a (one-dimensional) float channel according to a specified time-parameterized function (commonly an interpolation function).
      class  FunctionR1Vec3Controller  
      class  FunctionR1Vec4Controller  
      class  InteractiveJointController
      Manipulates a Vec3 channel (e.g. translation channel) according to a specified 3D function, which is modeling a path in 3D space.
      class  JointController
      Manipulates a Vec3 channel (e.g. translation channel) according to a specified 3D function, which is modeling a path in 3D space.
      class  PathController
      Deprecated.
      class  SliderController  
      class  TimeSliderController  

    • Uses of ChannelInterface in examples.controller

      Classes in examples.controller that implement ChannelInterface 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      class  CirclePosController
      Controller with output channel of type Vec3.
      class  CirclePosRadiusController
      Controller with output channel of type Vec3.
      class  ColorController
      Controller with output channel of type Vec3.
      class  ConnectorAddVec3  
      class  ElementaryController
      Very simple controller.
      class  FuncRootController  
      class  FuncRotController  
      class  HideController  
      class  InputController  
      class  KeyboardTranslationController  
      class  OneJointIKController  
      class  SimpleCircleController  

    • Uses of ChannelInterface in particles

      Classes in particles that implement ChannelInterface 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      class  ParticleController
      Manipulates particles of a particle system with a differential solver algorithm.
      class  ParticleEulerController  
      class  PointEmitter
      Generates particles and emits them from a specified position.

    • Uses of ChannelInterface in scenegraph

      Classes in scenegraph that implement ChannelInterface 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      class  AbstCamera
      Base class for camera handling.
      class  AbstGeometry
      This is the base class for all objects in the scene, which need to be drawn.
      class  AbstLight
      Base class for different type of light sources within the scene.
      class  AbstMeshData
      Base class for mesh data storage.
      class  AbstNode
      Base class for all node objects in the scene graph.
      class  AbstRenderState
      Base class for state control of the render engine.
      class  AbstSceneObject
      Base class for scene graph objects and objects who store date for the scene graph objects (e.g. mesh data, which is used by TriangleMesh).
      class  AbstSpatial
      Base class for all spatial components in the scene graph.
      class  AmbientLight
      Class for storing and providing access to the Ambient light's attributes
      class  Blendshape
      Class for blend shape deforming (morphing).
      class  ColorState
      Class to store and provide access to the color state attributes.
      class  Cone
      Cone mesh.
      class  Cube
      Cube mesh.
      class  Cylinder
      Cylinder mesh.
      class  Group
      Class that implements a group node in the scenegraph.
      class  Joint
      Class that implements a group node in the scenegraph.
      class  Line
      Class for polygon lines.
      class  MaterialState
      Class to store and provide access to the render engine's material attributes.
      class  ParticleGroup
      Class for a group of particles.
      class  PerspectiveCamera
      Class modeling the perspective camera, basically storing and providing access to FOV (Field of View) (all other attributes are in parent class)
      class  Point
      Class for points.
      class  PointLight
      Class for storing and providing access to the Point light's attributes
      class  SkinCluster
      Class for a set of vertices connected to a skeleton.
      class  SkyBox
      Class for basic geometric shapes: Cube, Sphere, Torus, Teapot, Cone and Tetrahedron.
      class  Sphere
      Sphere mesh.
      class  StaticMesh
      Vertex Storage for static meshes
      class  TextureState
      Class to store and provide access to the render engine's material attributes.
      class  Torus
      Torus mesh.
      class  TriangleMesh
      Class provides storage and management for triangle meshes.
